term: How does the situation land become political?
content:
this will become further a political question when slavery comes into question (and it becomes a political issue)

the minimum purchase price meant that anybody can buy a 160 acre farm
but you wouldnâ€™t have slaves on that farm that small
if you begin to fill up territories/properties with small 160 acre farms without slaves, you are essentially excluding slavery from a territory (which is how it becomes a pollitical thing)
